comment: This might have been the most intense class i've ever had (although after being out of college for a long time).  Dasigi is very thorough and expects a lot in the structures course.  He is very professional and enthusiastic about the subject. I got an A but had to work hard for it.
Was tough but I learned alot, would consider taking him again for another course.
Courteous and professional.  He's not the easiest prof, but that is really a good thing if you're serious about learning this stuff.  Seriously.

A thoroughly competent teacher who obviously knows his stuff.  Tests and projects are difficult but designed to make sure you know your stuff too by the end of his class.  Slight accent decorates his speech rather than obscuring it.

The projects are challenging and require alot of time.  He will help, but his hints are often more confusing than  trying to figure it out yourself.  The tests are thorough.  Work hard on the projects and listen in class and you will get an A.
He is knowledgeable in whatever he's teaching. Tough on projects and too heavy assignments. Good communication.
